tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE potential_money_laundering_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL,
    sender_account VARCHAR,
    receiver_account VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL,
    sender_account VARCHAR,
    receiver_account VARCHAR,
    reason VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE potential_money_laundering_activities (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL,
    account_id UUID,
    account_holder_name VARCHAR(255),
    suspicious_activity BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_account_id UUID,
    receiver_account_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE money_laundering_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    reporting_officer_id UUID,
    report_date TIMESTAMP,
    suspect_account_id UUID,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  account_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE accounts (
  account_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  account_number VARCHAR(20),
  account_holder_name VARCHAR(100),
  account_balance DECIMAL,
  account_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(100),
  customer_address TEXT,
  customer_contact VARCHAR(20),
  customer_email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_description TEXT,
  alert_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_id INT,
  account_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    flagged BOOLEAN
);
